InReac: ^Samurai: Oh... Look at all this poor souls. What have all this monsters done
^Ninja: What a horrible scene to watch... Our own homeland... Like this
^Berserk: Some of them are still here, I say we make them pay for this
^Knight: Revenge is a path we must not walk my friend
^Samurai: I agree, but this field is a path we have to walk
^Samurai: So we have to fight this monsters no matter why
